# Banned Words and Phrases

Complete list of words and phrases that are automatically filtered out when generating social media content.

## Why These Are Banned

These phrases make content sound inauthentic, overly promotional, or like generic marketing copy. The goal is to sound like a real human sharing genuine insightsâ€”not a bot or marketing department.

---

## Marketing Hype (Auto-Reject)

### Revolutionary Claims
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Game-changing | Overused, vague | Describe actual impact |
| Revolutionary | Rarely true | Say what changed |
| Groundbreaking | ClichÃ© | Be specific |
| Paradigm shift | Buzzword | Explain the change |
| Quantum leap | Meaningless | Use real metrics |
| Breakthrough | Overhyped | "We discovered X" |
| Cutting-edge | ClichÃ© | Name the tech |
| State-of-the-art | Filler | List features |
| Next-gen | Meaningless | Version number |
| Industry-leading | Unprovable | Show data |

### Excitement Words
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Incredible | Vague | Describe specifics |
| Amazing | Overused | What exactly? |
| Awesome | Empty | Be specific |
| Unbelievable | Usually false | If true, show proof |
| Mind-blowing | ClichÃ© | "Surprised me because" |
| Jaw-dropping | Hyperbole | Delete it |
| Eye-opening | ClichÃ© | "I learned that" |
| Stunning | Overused | Describe what you saw |

---

## Engagement Bait (Auto-Reject)

### Clickbait Phrases
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| You won't believe | Manipulative | Just say it |
| This will blow your mind | Hyperbole | Share the insight |
| Stop scrolling! | Aggressive | Start with value |
| Most people don't know | Gatekeeping | Share openly |
| What nobody tells you | Gatekeeping | Share your experience |
| The secret to | Usually obvious | Just explain |
| Hidden gem | ClichÃ© | "I found this useful" |
| Life hack | Overused | "Here's a trick" |
| Game changer | Already banned | Use specifics |

### False Urgency
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Before it's too late | Manipulative | Delete it |
| Don't miss out | FOMO bait | Explain value |
| Last chance | If true, say when | Be specific |
| Limited time only | If true, say deadline | Be specific |
| Act now | Pushy | "Optional next step" |

---

## Tech Bro ClichÃ©s (Auto-Reject)

### Success Posturing
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Crushing it | ClichÃ© | Describe what you did |
| Killing it | ClichÃ© | Be specific |
| Smashed it | ClichÃ© | "Completed X" |
| On fire | ClichÃ© | Describe momentum |
| Grind never stops | Toxic | Share balance |
| Hustle hard | Toxic | Describe effort |
| Rise and grind | ClichÃ© | "Starting work" |
| 24/7 | Usually false | Be honest |
| No days off | Toxic | unsustainable |
| Sleep is for the weak | Toxic | Delete it |

### Self-Aggrandizing Titles
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Thought leader | Self-appointed | Share insights |
| Visionary | Prove by doing | Build something |
| Ninja | Cringe | Your actual role |
| Rockstar developer | Cringe | Senior engineer |
| Guru | Cult-like | Expert / Specialist |
| Maven | Pretentious | Specialist |
| Influencer | Vague | Content creator |
| Disruptor | Usually false | Builder / Founder |
| Serial entrepreneur | If >1, say number | "Founded X companies" |

---

## Performative Humility (Auto-Reject)

### Fake Modesty
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| I don't mean to brag, but... | You're bragging | Own your achievement |
| Humbled to announce | Usually false | "Excited to share" |
| Blessed to be part | Religious co-opting | "Grateful to work with" |
| Just a guy who | False modesty | Introduce yourself |
| Not to toot my own horn | You are | Share directly |
| I'm no expert but... | Then why listen? | Share what you know |
| Just my two cents | Undervaluing | Share confidently |
| Take it with a grain of salt | Undermining | Stand behind it |

---

## Empty Filler Phrases (Auto-Reject)

### Meaningless Connectors
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| At the end of the day | ClichÃ© | "Ultimately" |
| It is important to note | Filler | Delete or state directly |
| Needless to say | Then don't | Delete it |
| The fact of the matter is | Wordy | "The fact is" |
| In this day and age | Filler | "Today" |
| In today's world | Filler | "Today" |
| When all is said and done | ClichÃ© | "Finally" |
| For all intents and purposes | Wordy | "Effectively" |
| As a matter of fact | Wordy | Delete it |
| To be honest | Were you lying? | Delete it |
| To be fair | Usually defensive | Delete it |
| If you will | Filler | Delete it |
| So to speak | Filler | Delete it |

### Corporate Speak
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Synergy | Meaningless | Describe collaboration |
| Leverage | Buzzword | Use / Build on |
| Circle back | Corporate | "Follow up" |
| Touch base | Corporate | "Talk" / "Check in" |
| Deep dive | ClichÃ© | "Detailed look" |
| Bandwidth | Corporate | "Time" / "Capacity" |
| Low-hanging fruit | ClichÃ© | "Easy wins" |
| Move the needle | ClichÃ© | "Make progress" |
| Take offline | Corporate | "Discuss separately" |
| Reach out | Corporate | "Contact" / "Ask" |

---

## Generic Tech Terms (Use Specifics)

### Vague Technical Claims
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Scalable | How? | "Handles 10K requests/sec" |
| Performant | How fast? | "Sub-100ms response time" |
| Robust | Vague | "Handles failures gracefully" |
| Flexible | How? | Describe options |
| Seamless | Usually false | Show the integration |
| Intuitive | To whom? | "Easy to learn" |
| User-friendly | Filler | Describe the UX |
| Enterprise-grade | Meaningless | Say what it handles |
| Production-ready | Prove it | Describe testing |
| Battle-tested | ClichÃ© | "Used by X companies" |

### Innovation Claims
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Innovative | Prove it | Describe what's new |
| Disruptive | Usually false | "Alternative to X" |
| Transformative | Vague | Describe change |
| Revolutionary | Already banned | See above |
| First-of-its-kind | Probably not | Be specific |
| Patent-pending | So what | Explain the value |
| Proprietary | Who cares | Explain benefits |
| World-class | To whom? | Compare to competitors |

---

## Inspirational Platitudes (Auto-Reject)

### Empty Motivation
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Follow your dreams | ClichÃ© | Share your path |
| Chase your passion | ClichÃ© | Share what you built |
| Believe in yourself | Empty | Give practical advice |
| Never give up | Toxic | When to quit is wisdom |
| Dreams don't work unless you do | ClichÃ© | Describe the effort |
| The only limit is you | False | External constraints exist |
| Anything is possible | False | Be realistic |
| Just do it | Trademarked | Describe first step |
| Make it happen | Empty | Describe how |
| You only live once | ClichÃ© | "Here's what I tried" |

---

## Performatively Relatable (Auto-Reject)

### Fake Struggle Posts
| Phrase | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|--------|----------------|-------------|
| Anyone else...? | Engagement bait | Describe your experience |
| Tell me I'm not the only one | Fishing | Share openly |
| Is it just me or...? | Fishing | State your observation |
| We've all been there | Assumption | "I experienced this" |
| The struggle is real | ClichÃ© | Describe actual difficulty |
| Adulting is hard | Overused | Share specific challenge |
| Monday blues | ClichÃ© | Describe the feeling |
| Can't have | ClichÃ© | Delete it |

---

## Overused Emojis (Use Sparingly)

### Auto-Reject Excessive
| Emoji | Rule | Alternative |
|-------|------|-------------|
| ðŸš€ | Max 1 per post | Use 0 or 1 |
| ðŸ”¥ | Max 1 per post | Use 0 or 1 |

| ðŸŽ¯ | Max 1 per post | Use 0 or 1 |

| ðŸ’ª | Max 1 per post | Use 0 or 1 |
| ðŸ¤¯ | Max 1 per post | Use 0 or 1 |

**Rule**: If > 2 emojis total, auto-reject.

---

## Hashtag Abuse

### Auto-Reject Patterns
| Pattern | Why It's Banned | Use Instead |
|---------|----------------|-------------|
| #FollowForFollow | Cheap engagement | Delete it |
| #LikeForLike | Cheap engagement | Delete it |
| #F4F | Cheap engagement | Delete it |
| #InstaGood | Meaningless | Delete it |
| #PhotoOfTheDay | Everyone claims this | Delete it |
| #Trending | If true, prove it | Delete it |
| #Viral | If true, share metrics | Delete it |
| #FYP | TikTok specific | Delete it on LinkedIn |
| #Explore | Meaningless | Delete it |
| 10+ hashtags | Looks spammy | Use 3-5 relevant |

**Rule**: Max 5 hashtags on LinkedIn, 3 on Twitter, 0 on WhatsApp.

---

## Validation Rules

### Auto-Reject If Content Contains:
1. Any phrase from Marketing Hype section
2. Any phrase from Engagement Bait section
3. Any phrase from Tech Bro ClichÃ©s section
4. Any phrase from Performative Humility section
5. More than 2 emojis total
6. More than 5 hashtags (LinkedIn) or 3 (Twitter)
7. More than 2 exclamation points

### Warning Flags (Human Review):
1. Borderline phrases (e.g., "really" used as hype)
2. Generic claims without specifics
3. Overly long sentences (>25 words)
4. Paragraphs without spacing

---

## Usage in Code

```python
BANNED_PHRASES = [
    # Marketing Hype
    "game-changing", "revolutionary", "groundbreaking",
    "paradigm shift", "quantum leap", "cutting-edge",
    # ... (full list in implementation)

    # Engagement Bait
    "you won't believe", "this will blow your mind",
    "stop scrolling", "most people don't know",

    # Tech Bro ClichÃ©s
    "crushing it", "killing it", "thought leader",
    "ninja", "rockstar developer", "hustle hard",

    # ... (complete list in implementation)
]

def validate_content(text: str) -> tuple[bool, list[str]]:
    """Validate content against banned phrases.

    Returns:
        (is_valid, list_of_violations)
    """
    text_lower = text.lower()
    violations = []

    for phrase in BANNED_PHRASES:
        if phrase in text_lower:
            violations.append(phrase)

    return len(violations) == 0, violations
```

---

## Quick Reference

### Top 10 Most Banned (Auto-Reject)
1. Game-changing
2. Revolutionary
3. Crushing it
4. Thought leader
5. You won't believe
6. At the end of the day
7. Synergy
8. Leverage
9. Humbled to announce
10. Follow your dreams

### Safe Alternatives
| Instead Of | Use |
|------------|-----|
| "It's game-changing" | "This reduced errors by 40%" |
| "I'm crushing it" | "Shipped 3 features this week" |
| "Thought leader" | "Engineer who writes about X" |
| "You won't believe" | Delete, just say it |
| "At the end of the day" | "Ultimately" |
| "Leverage our platform" | "Use our API" |
| "Revolutionary new app" | "New app for X" |
